name: Bellose Silicone Hair Treatment
description: Bellose Silicone Hair Treatment, is a lightweight formula offering superior smoothness , shine and softness to your frizzy untamed hair. It prevents your hair from being greasy and sticky. The Bellose Silicone Hair Treatment does not weigh your hair down , helps undo environmental damage caused to your hair and helps to protect your hair from damages caused by UV rays. *Images for illustration purpose only, Product received may vary.
